EmailTemplate.subject: Q&A Panel Session with the Spring Team | Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Q&A Panel Session with the Spring Team <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/QA-Panel-Session-with-the-Spring-Team.html]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!Â Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>.
The Pivotal Team Agend <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/NorthAm_Event_PanelSessionSpringBootTeam_NewYork_Q119.html]]>a
